text: Elías Antonio "Tony" Saca González (born March 9, 1965) is a Salvadoran politician. He was the President of El Salvador from 2004 to 2009. Saca was a member of the ARENA until 2010 when he switched to the GANA from 2013. Saca was born in Usulután, El Salvador. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Presidential website *Biography by CIDOB (in Spanish) *President Bush Meets with President Saca of El Salvador Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of El Salvador Category:21st-century presidents in North America
title: Antonio Saca
